text:
Hi

I have a HubSpot developer account but I am not able to create app for the Access token to use the Hubsport API calls.

any help on this?

Hi all :wave:
Is it possible to have multiple apps in the same project, but deploy them independently? My scenario is that I have 2 apps in the same project, but they will have different release cycles. So it is ok if they are build together with every push to my branch, but I wanted the deployment to be separate from each other. Is that possible?
